qlearning
Interface Rangement

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Stockage, StockageNN, StockageNNSingle
public interface Rangement
extends Serializable

Framework defining methods to store, retrieve, enumerate state/action values.

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
Francesco De Comite (decomite at lifl.fr)
